channel.title: Publications on Robin Lovelace's website. Energy. Transport. Technology. Change the World.
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Robin Lovelace's website. Energy. Transport. Technology. Change the World.

item.description: This is a list of my publications to date: Books Gillespie, C., Lovelace, R., 2016. Efficient R Programming: A Practical Guide to Smarter Programming. O’Reilly Media, and as a free learning resource from its website. Lovelace, R., Dumont, M., 2016. Spatial microsimulation with R. CRC Press and (to see source code) github. Lovelace, R., & McLoughlin, A., 2014. Engineering in Development: Transport. Engineers Without Borders (UK), Draft (high resolution images - 24 Mb).
